what: Package for analyzing NCAA: March Madness
title: Package for analyzing NCAA: March Madness
text: goal marchmadness analyze team’s performance determine whether historical performance effect public picks team. Thus, dataset give insight enable prediction final ranking team.

title: Package for analyzing NCAA: March Madness
text: can install development version marchmadness GitHub :

title: Package for analyzing NCAA: March Madness
text: basic example shows solve common problem. can see dataset using following code. can see summary dataset using following code:
code: library(marchmadness) data("march_madness_dataset") ## basic example code summary(march_madness_dataset) #>       YEAR          TEAMNO           TEAM                SEED       #>  Min.   :2016   Min.   : 536.0   Length:512         Min.   : 1.00   #>  1st Qu.:2018   1st Qu.: 671.8   Class :character   1st Qu.: 4.75   #>  Median :2020   Median : 807.5   Mode  :character   Median : 8.50   #>  Mean   :2020   Mean   : 807.9                      Mean   : 8.50   #>  3rd Qu.:2022   3rd Qu.: 943.2                      3rd Qu.:12.25   #>  Max.   :2024   Max.   :1079.0                      Max.   :16.00   #>                                                                     #>      ROUND           POWER           FINALS       #>  Min.   : 0.00   Min.   :42.50   Min.   : 0.030   #>  1st Qu.:16.00   1st Qu.:59.80   1st Qu.: 0.050   #>  Median :32.00   Median :66.85   Median : 0.115   #>  Mean   :37.34   Mean   :67.77   Mean   : 1.562   #>  3rd Qu.:64.00   3rd Qu.:77.08   3rd Qu.: 0.640   #>  Max.   :64.00   Max.   :92.30   Max.   :34.920   #>                                  NA's   :448

what: NCAA March Madness Basketball Data — march_madness_dataset
title: NCAA March Madness Basketball Data — march_madness_dataset
text: dataset contains college basketball teams' performances public picks March Madness competition 2016 2024. Please keep mind public picks 2024 data.

title: NCAA March Madness Basketball Data — march_madness_dataset
NCAA March Madness Basketball Data — march_madness_dataset
text: data frame 512 rows 7 variables. YEAR Ending year team's season TEAMNO Unique identifier team TEAM Division college basketball team SEED Preliminary ranking March Madness tournament ROUND Farthest round team made tournament POWER Calculation team's strength relative teams tournament Heatcheck FINALS percentage people picked team win game Finals

title: NCAA March Madness Basketball Data — march_madness_dataset
